Youth Cycling for Inclusion

Promoting social inclusion of disadvantaged young people through cycling, environmental awareness, and sustainable mobility.

Learn More View All Partners

Our Objectives

Social Inclusion

Support disadvantaged youth to integrate into society and the labor market through cycling activities.

Green Mobility

Promote sustainable transportation and environmental awareness among young people.

Skills Development

Build confidence, autonomy, and employability through practical cycling training.

Professional Tools

Equip youth workers with resources to organize inclusive cycling sessions.

Our Partners

Four organizations across Europe working together for youth inclusion through cycling

F

FLVS

France

Lead Partner

ASSOC

Romania

A

AFIS

CSL

Greece

View All Partners

Work Packages

The project is organized into five work packages

1

WP1: Project Management

Coordination, quality assurance, and administrative management of the project.

2

WP2: Cycling Knowledge

Development of educational materials and training modules on cycling.

3

WP3: From Theory to Practice

Practical cycling sessions for disadvantaged youth and training for professionals.

4

WP4: Digital Platform

Development of a digital learning application for cycling and environmental awareness.

5

WP5: Dissemination & Evaluation

Communication, dissemination of results, and quality evaluation.

Learn More About Our Work

Latest News

Stay informed about the latest project developments

September 15, 2025

First Partnership Meeting Announced

Partners will convene for the first transnational meeting to kick off project activities and establish work package timelines.

September 1, 2025

CYCLOS Project Officially Launches

The CYCLOS project has officially begun, bringing together four partner organizations from France, Romania, Austria, and Greece to promote youth inclusion through cycling.
